00055 void EventConfig::PrintAsPhp(FILE *f) const
00056 {
00057    fprintf(f, "<?php\n");
00058 
00059    fprintf(f, "\n// MeasInfo data\n");
00060    if (!fMeasInfo) {
00061       Error("PrintAsPhp", "fMeasInfo not defined");
00062    } else {
00063       fMeasInfo->PrintAsPhp(f);
00064    }
00065 
00066    fprintf(f, "\n// AnaInfo data\n");
00067    if (!fAnaInfo) {
00068       Error("PrintAsPhp", "fAnaInfo not defined");
00069    } else {
00070       fAnaInfo->PrintAsPhp(f);
00071    }
00072 
00073    fprintf(f, "\n// Calibrator data\n");
00074    if (!fCalibrator) {
00075       Error("PrintAsPhp", "fCalibrator not defined");
00076    } else {
00077       fCalibrator->PrintAsPhp(f);
00078    }
00079 
00080    fprintf(f, "\n// AnaMeasResult data\n");
00081    if (!fAnaMeasResult) {
00082       Error("PrintAsPhp", "fAnaMeasResult not defined");
00083    } else {
00084       fAnaMeasResult->PrintAsPhp(f);
00085    }
00086 
00087    fprintf(f, "\n// MseMeasInfoX data\n");
00088    if (!fMseMeasInfoX) {
00089       Error("PrintAsPhp", "fMseMeasInfoX not defined");
00090    } else {
00091       fMseMeasInfoX->PrintAsPhp(f);
00092    }
00093    
00094    fprintf(f, "?>\n\n");
00095 }

00099 void EventConfig::PrintAsConfig(FILE *f) const
00100 {
00101    fprintf(f, "* Strip t0 ec edead A0 A1 ealph dwidth pede C0 C1 C2 C3 C4\n");
00102    fprintf(f, "* for the dead layer and T0  : %s\n", fMeasInfo->GetRunName().c_str());
00103    fprintf(f, "* for the Am calibration     : %s\n", fAnaInfo->GetAlphaCalibRun().c_str());
00104    fprintf(f, "* for the Integral/Amplitude : default\n");
00105    fprintf(f, "* \n");
00106 
00107    fCalibrator->PrintAsConfig(f);
00108 }

00112 string EventConfig::GetSignature() const
00113 {
00114    string strSignature = "signature not defined";
00115 
00116    if (fAnaInfo && fMeasInfo) {
00117 
00118       char strMeasStartTime[25];
00119       time_t measStartTime = fMeasInfo->fStartTime;
00120       tm *ltime = localtime(&measStartTime);
00121       strftime(strMeasStartTime, 25, "%c", ltime);
00122 
00123       char strAnaEndTime[25];
00124       time_t anaEndTime = fAnaInfo->fAnaDateTime + (time_t) fAnaInfo->fAnaTimeReal;
00125       //printf("***anaEndTime: %lld\n", anaEndTime);
00126       ltime = localtime(&anaEndTime);
00127       strftime(strAnaEndTime, 25, "%c", ltime);
00128 
00129       strSignature = fAnaInfo->GetRunName() + ": Recorded " + strMeasStartTime + ", "
00130                      + " Analyzed " + strAnaEndTime;
00131 
00132       strSignature += ", Version " + fAnaInfo->fAsymVersion + ", " + fAnaInfo->fUserGroup.fUser;
00133    }
00134 
00135    return strSignature;
00136 }

00140 bool EventConfig::operator<(const EventConfig &mc) const
00141 {
00142    if (fMeasInfo->RUNID < mc.fMeasInfo->RUNID) return true;
00143    return false;
00144 }
